text: (Napiye!) Avarkalutaiya celvankalum, avarkalutaiya makkalum (perukiyiruppatu) unkalai accariyappatutta ventam. Allah (avarrai avarkalukkuk kotuttu) avarraik kontu avarkalai ivvulaka valvileye vetanai ceyya niccayamaka natukiran. Innum, avarkal nirakarippavarkalaka irukkum nilaimaiyil avarkalutaiya uyir povataiyum natukiran
